title: Billy Crystal Takes The Colbert Questionert | Colbert Classic
description:
If you don't know his favorite sandwich, or which animal scares him the most, do you really know Billy Crystal? Stephen Colbert went deep with Mr. Saturday Night himself in this edition of America's favorite Late Show segment, The Colbert Questionert.
